body:
## Expected Behavior

The error message for `serviceerror.NotFound` reads `sql: no rows in result set` (at least when using SQLite).

## Actual Behavior

The error message for `serviceerror.NotFound` should return a persistence-unrelated error message.

## Steps to Reproduce the Problem

```
> ./temporal batch terminate --job-id test --reason testing
Error: unable to stop a batch job test: sql: no rows in result set
```

## Specifications

  - Version: 1.23
  - Platform: OSX
title: `serviceerror.NotFound` error message contains Server implementation details
